New Records: USA secured their first ever super-over win in a T20 World Cup final against Pakistan
Key Match Events: The match went into a super over after both teams scored 159 in their innings
USA won the super over with 18 for one and Pakistan scored 13 for one
Pre-Game Insights: USA aimed for back-to-back wins in the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: USA captain Monank Patel hoped the win would boost cricket's popularity in the USA
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both teams faced India in their next matches
